history.proof: intros f. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce LNTFunction to an evaluable reference.

Abstracting over the term "l0" leads to a term fun l1 : LNTFunction => f = l1 -> n0 (codeLNTFunction l1) = S (n l (inr l1)) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "@inr" of type "forall A B : Type, B -> A + B" cannot be applied to the terms "Relations l" : "Set" "Functions l" : "Set" "l1" : "LNTFunction" The 3rd term has type "LNTFunction" which should be coercible to "Functions l".

original: intros f. unfold codeArityLNTF, arity, LNT, LNTFunction. destruct f eqn:Hf. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. reflexivity.
